text:
When a request includes parameters there should be an option to encrypt those parameters, such as a password.  This would prevent the plain text password being visible in the JMeter GUI as well in the jmx file itself.

Similar to 34321.
creator: timcassidy13@gmail.com

text:
This is out of scope of jmeter.
There is already some GUI complexity and implementing this would make it even more complex.
You could implement it using either BeanShell , or a custom function.
